More InFo:

Coil were approached to compose the soundtrack for Hellraiser, the result was 
apparently the only record Clive Barker had ever heard that he had to turn off 
because it &#039;made his bowels churn&#039;.

Printed on sleeve:

"The only group I&#039;ve heard on disc, whose records I&#039;ve taken off 
because they made my bowels churn." - Clive Barker, Director of Hellraiser.
